title: Creativity home
posting_body: Charming 3 bedroom and 2.5 bathroom home in the desirable Southwood neighborhood.
House is situated on a quiet, tree lined street with great curb appeal.
This single story home provides a spacious master suite with a fireplace, separate shower and tub in master bathroom.
Kitchen has stainless appliances and the laundry room is located just off the kitchen.
This home also features air conditioning, central heating, smooth ceilings, recessed lighting, hardwood floors throughout, and a 2 car detached garage.
Award winning Torrance Unified School District.
Only minutes to malls, shops & restaurants.
I will do my best to answer emails)
Tenants pay utilities, owners pay gardening service.
